text: The 1924 Arizona Wildcats football team represented the University of Arizona as an independent during the 1924 college football season. In their tenth season under head coach Pop McKale, the Wildcats compiled a 2–4 record and were outscored by their opponents, 93 to 40. The team captain was Kirke LaShelle. == Schedule == == References == Arizona Category:Arizona Wildcats football seasons Arizona Wildcats football team
title: 1924 Arizona Wildcats football team
